dmca.title: Last Unicorn Author wants unauthorized Spanish translation to vanish
dmca.body:
Dear [private] and Colleagues:
 
I represent, among others, Peter S. Beagle. On 22 January 2007, I noticed that your site blogger.com, at http://elultimounicorniodebeagle.blogspot.com, purportedly controlled by a
dmca.sender_name: LAW OFFICE OF CHARLES E PETIT
